definitions.definition: A sum or source of money .
examples: the fund of a bank, commercial house, manufacturing corporation, etc.
a fund for the maintenance of underprivileged students

definitions.definition: A money-management operation, such as a mutual fund .
examples: Several major funds were declared insolvent recently.

definitions.definition: A large supply of something to be drawn upon.
examples: He drew on his immense fund of knowledge.

main_definition: A sum or source of money .
secondary_definitions: A money-management operation, such as a mutual fund .
A large supply of something to be drawn upon.
